md:
giải nghĩa từ "mistake" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Mistake** (noun)

* Meaning: an error or a wrong action
* Type: noun
* Vietnamese meaning: lỗi, sai lầm

Example sentence: "I made a mistake on the math test and got a bad grade."

* Related words: error, fault, blunder, slip

**Mistake** (verb)

* Meaning: to make an error or do something wrong
* Type: verb
* Vietnamese meaning: làm sai, phạm lỗi

Example sentence: "I mistook the time of the meeting and showed up late."

* Related words: err, blunder, slip up, mess up

Example sentence: "I made a mistake on the math test and got a bad grade."

  • Related words: error, fault, blunder, slip

Mistake (verb)

  • Vietnamese meaning: làm sai, phạm lỗi

Example sentence: "I mistook the time of the meeting and showed up late."
